import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { login } from "../actions/authActions"; const Modal = ({props, history}) => { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin // const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1]: '/' useEffect(() => { if (userInfo) { history.push('/') } }, [history, userInfo]) const loginButton = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(username, password)) document.getElementById("modal-03").classList.remove("show"); } return (

setUsername(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />
